lead_paragraph: The riot at Khalis prison in eastern Iraq killed at least six police officers and 30 prisoners, Iraqi authorities said on Saturday.

headline.print_headline: Dozens Die and 40 Escape in Iraqi Prison Riot
headline.main: Dozens Die and 40 Escape in Iraqi Prison Riot

snippet: The riot at Khalis prison in eastern Iraq killed at least six police officers and 30 prisoners, Iraqi authorities said on Saturday.
abstract: Forty inmates escape Khalis prison in Diyala Province, Iraq, following uprising that left at least six officers and 30 prisoners dead; escapees include some prisoners convicted of terrorism charges.
